新的 Linux 恶意软件 Hadooken 针对 Oracle WebLogic 服务器https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/new-linux-malware-hadooken-targets-oracle-weblogic-servers/ Fri, 13 Sep 2024 13:05:58 -0400比尔·图拉斯SecurityCloudLinux https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/new-linux-malware-hadooken-targets-oracle-weblogic-servers/ Hackers are targeting Oracle WebLogic servers to infect them with a new Linux malware named "Hadooken, which launches a cryptominer and a tool for distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attacks.
